DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of VEC-162 compared to placebo to improve sleep parameters in a model of insomnia.
DOC.brief_title: VEC-162 Study in Healthy Adult Volunteers in a Model of Insomnia
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects with no medical, psychiatric or current sleep disorders. Subject must sign a written consent form. Recent history of night shift work or jet lag. Prior experience sleeping in a sleep lab environment. History of sleep disorders.
